wikipedia_page.main: Scott Matthews (born 8 February 1994) is a Welsh rugby union player who plays for Newport Gwent Dragons regional team as a flanker having previously played for Cross Keys RFC. He is a Wales under-20 international.

response: Scott Matthews is an English singer-songwriter from Wolverhampton, England."Scott Matthews – engagingly thoughtful and classy singer-songwriter" The Guardian (19 August 2014)
